Package org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.model

Interface SNodeChangeListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SNodeChangeListenerAdapter, SRepositoryContentAdapter
    public interface SNodeChangeListener
    Listener to track changes to individual nodes in a model.

    Change listeners get notified regardless of model being attached to a repository. If, however, model is attached to a repository, all notifications are delivered inside a write lock on the repository after a real change.

    Since:
    3.3
    See Also:
    SNodeChangeListenerAdapter, SModel.addChangeListener(SNodeChangeListener)
